user_query: give Phantom Thread a B+ guys thank you so much as always for watching I really appreciate it and thank you for continuing to support my endeavors over the years through film and the various things I've tried to do it really honestly means a lot to me the fact that I get to go to the Critics Choice Awards tomorrow it's kind of crazy to me because for a long time I would just look on the computer or on my phone at events like that and think that's never gonna be something I'm gonna be able to go to and I it's just kind of nuts that I'm gonna be able to go to this awesome ceremony that I've heard about for years and I get to bring my wife and we're invited and it just feels awesome it's and I owe that to you guys for for watching and supporting me over all these years so thank you so much guys if you liked this you can click right here and get stuck on eyes
